items.title: Using the Veil of Ignorance to align AI systems with principles of justice
items.authorship: Laura Weidinger, Kevin R. McKee, Richard Everett, Saffron Huang, Tina O. Zhu, Martin J. Chadwick, Christopher Summerfield, Iason Gabriel
items.research_method: Incentive-compatible online experiments (5 studies, N=2,508); randomized controlled experimental design; logistic regression analysis; coded open-ended responses
items.data_repository: Open Science Framework - listed in Materials and Methods
items.code_repository: OSF (analysis scripts and code available with data)

items.title: Model Cards for Model Reporting
items.authorship: Margaret Mitchell, Simone Wu, Andrew Zaldivar, Parker Barnes, Lucy Vasserman, Ben Hutchinson, Elena Spitzer, Inioluwa Deborah Raji, Timnit Gebru
items.research_method: Framework proposal with illustrative case examples (smiling classifier; toxicity detector)
items.data_repository: Example evaluations reference external datasets (e.g., CelebA, Perspective API), but no dedicated data release accompanies this paper.
items.code_repository: Example models referenced but not released with code in this paper.

items.title: Datasheets for Datasets
items.authorship: Timnit Gebru, Jamie Morgenstern, Briana Vecchione, Jennifer Wortman Vaughan, Hanna Wallach, Hal Daum√© III, Kate Crawford
items.research_method: Normative proposal with structured template and prototype examples
items.data_repository: The paper includes prototype documentation of existing datasets but does not release new data.
items.code_repository: No code repository associated with this framework paper.
